product_name: MILK MAKEUPHydro Grip 12HR Dewy Setting Spray With Hyaluronic Acid + Niacinamide
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackMilk Makeup’s Hydro Grip Set + Refresh Spray is an award-winning dewy setting spray that sets makeup for up to 12 hours without fading or drying out skin. Supercharged with hyaluronic acid, niacinamide, aloe, and blue agave extract for a glowy, glass skin finish.
details: DetailsBenefitsClinically proven to set makeup up to 12 hoursNatural dewy finish gives a glass skin effectFormulated with high-quality skincareClean, vegan, cruelty-freeHelps prevent makeup from fading, creasing, and cakingAlcohol-free, so it won’t dry out skinNon-comedogenic, so it won’t clog poresFragrance-free, so it won’t freak out your skinNo sticky, greasy, or heavy hairspray feelMicrofine mist feels weightless and refreshingWorks for all skin typesSafe for acne-prone skinAerosol-free pump5x award-winning formulaKey IngredientsBlue agave extract locks makeup in place to prevent melting, fading, and creasingHyaluronic acid and niacinamide (vitamin B3) hydrate for a glowy, glassy skin finishHemp seed extract and aloe help calm, soothe, and lock in moistureResearch ResultsIn a consumer perception study of 20 people using the product in a 12-hour period.100% said it immediately sets and locks in makeup95% said skin immediately looks hydrated and refreshed100% said it helps lock in makeup and lasts for 12 hours90% said makeup looks better and stays on better after 12 hoursItem 2634884How To UseShake well before using.Hold bottle eight to 10 inches away from face and mist evenly onto skin. Close mouth and eyes while spraying.Let set for 60 seconds.Reapply throughout the day as needed to refresh skin and boost hydration.Pro Tip: For longer-lasting makeup, start your routine with Hydro Grip Primer (sold separately).IngredientsWater (Aqua, Eau), Hydrogenated Ethylhexyl Olivate, Caprylyl Methicone, Octyldodecanol, Isononyl Isononanoate, Isopropyl Palmitate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Seed Extract, Agave Tequilana Leaf Extract, Prunus Avium (Sweet Cherry) Flower Extract, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Orchis Mascula Extract, Coccinia Indica Fruit Extract, Solanum Melongena (Eggplant) Fruit Extract, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Flower Extract, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Leaf Extract, Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Seed Oil, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Niacinamide, Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Vegetable Amino Acids, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Unsaponifiables, Maltose, Sodium Phytate, Glycerin, Erythritol, Methyl Gluceth-10, Pentylene Glycol, Polyester-5, PVP, Sorbitol, Propylene Glycol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Amber Powder, Homarine HCl, Hydroxyacetophenone, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Acetate, Benzoic Acid, Dehydroacetic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Blue 1 (CI 42090).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Shake well before using.Hold bottle eight to 10 inches away from face and mist evenly onto skin. Close mouth and eyes while spraying.Let set for 60 seconds.Reapply throughout the day as needed to refresh skin and boost hydration.Pro Tip: For longer-lasting makeup, start your routine with Hydro Grip Primer (sold separately).

reviews.headline: awful
reviews.comments: this stuff never seemed to set on me, my makeup just wiped right off. even when combined with the milk primer. total waste of money.

reviews.headline: Feels Gross
reviews.comments: I have dry-combination skin, so I thought this would be great to lock in my makeup without it getting patchy by the end of my workday...but this is actually the worst setting spray I've ever used. First off, I had to purchase it twice - the nozzle broke immediately the first time and I couldn't figure out how to get the product out without breaking the bottle; it AGAIN broke immediately the second time but I was able to pour the product into an empty spray bottle this time. Now, I get that it's supposed to be hydrating and "dewy," but as soon as I first sprayed it I noticed it NEVER seemed to set - it just stayed wet and tacky, which I HATED. My face feels greasy rather than freshly made up, and sure enough, within a few hours my makeup is a total mess and looks completely melted off like it would on a humid, sweaty day. It just looks and feels so gross. I know everyone is different but I genuinely can't imagine how it has such a high rating when even someone whose skin is on the dry side ends up a greaseball.

reviews.headline: Too greasy/dewy
reviews.comments: I got this mini size to try and i love dewy makeup but this was just too much. It made me look like a grease ball i had to cake my face in powder. I also felt that it reallg didnt set my makeup.

reviews.headline: Great Spray
reviews.comments: I got it in the travel size and I honestly love it! It leaves my skin flawless and so HYDRATING!

reviews.headline: Great Spray
reviews.comments: I got it in the travel size and I honestly love it! It leaves my skin flawless and so HYDRATING!

reviews.headline: Best sprayer
reviews.comments: Ive tried so many, this is my favorite because the mister is amazing and its lightweight! Makes makeup last, will be a recurring purchase.

reviews.headline: Not a fan
reviews.comments: Works okay as a quick primer but doesn't stand out as a setting spray. Smells like moldy factory clothes or something. Definitely smells unpleasant. Isn't the worst product but definitely not the greatest.

reviews.headline: Good but not great
reviews.comments: Its an okay setting spray, but it doesnt do what the description says in my experience. It doesnt show dewy on me at all, and it feels sticky and drying. So basically it works like a matte setting spray for me.

reviews.headline: Wouldn't recommend
reviews.comments: I didn't see any significant difference. It also had a scent that bothered me.

reviews.headline: I wanted to love it, but…..
reviews.comments: Unfortunately, this product did not do what I thought it would do and it ended up burning my face. So I had to toss it.

reviews.headline: The perfect setting spray
reviews.comments: Dewy is the key!  I have mature skin and this hydrating formula keeps my makeup looking fresh and clean. It doesn't look dry or creased as is common with most setting sprays.

faceoff_positive.comments: This has got to be my new favorite spray! I got this complimentary from Influenster in my Clean Beauty VoxBox this month for my honest review and was super excited to try it as I've heard nothing but great things about it! The hype is real and I definitely recommend getting this! I used it as a primer and setting spray. It has a very light tacky feel to it when used as a primer so it adheres your makeup to your skin really well. As a setting spray, it melts your powder into your skin so it looks like your skin to make the powder seamless! It's so lightweight and a little goes a long way. I like the finish and it kept my skin looking flawless all day even with wearing a mask and sweating while exercising at physical therapy. There's no strong scent so it's great to use and not have to worry about sensitivity to scent or coughing up a lung because it's too strong. The spray nozzle on the bottle is phenomenal which was one of the first things I noticed. I definitely would recommend this spray!
faceoff_positive.headline: Love this spray!!!

First off, I had to purchase it twice - the nozzle broke immediately the first time and I couldn't figure out how to get the product out without breaking the bottle; it AGAIN broke immediately the second time but I was able to pour the product into an empty spray bottle this time. Now, I get that it's supposed to be hydrating and "dewy," but as soon as I first sprayed it I noticed it NEVER seemed to set - it just stayed wet and tacky, which I HATED. My face feels greasy rather than freshly made up, and sure enough, within a few hours my makeup is a total mess and looks completely melted off like it would on a humid, sweaty day. faceoff_negative.headline: Feels Gross

rollup.name: Hydro Grip 12HR Dewy Setting Spray With Hyaluronic Acid + Niacinamide
